main.name: Suraj Raj
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Suraj. I am a Certified Ethical Hacker v10 from Ec Council and a Software Engineer at Capgemini. I have an experience of one year in Web development. I am constantly seeking to engage my knowledge to learn something useful and keep challenging myself to be a better performer in accordance with the company's standards.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Adding new features and applications following agile development strategy.

projects.title: E-Commerce(Mongo, Spring Boot and React js)

testimonials.text: From the start of the project, through to completion, Suraj supported us and exceeded our expectations in every way. Not only was our experience personal and friendly, his ability to identify and present our key messages in an imaginative and creative way gave us a huge amount of confidence in him. He's reliable, professional and easy to work with. we look forward to continuing our working relationship together.

I was looking for a Web professional who would create and evolve my website. Suraj delivers exactly what I want. Itâ€™s always a pleasure working and seeing him. I enjoy meeting virtually and I always leave his place with a spring in my step and a smile on my face. I know he will keep improving my website and advising me in the best ways forward for years to come. I look forward to a great working relationship and friendship with him.
